data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Los Ríos, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Los Ríos, Chile
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Los Ríos, Chile.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Los Ríos prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Los Ríos.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Pashtun, Northern people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Pashtun, Northern people.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Los Ríos, Chile to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Los Ríos words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Please, teach the 83,842 believers in Los Ríos, Chile how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

location.name: Los Ríos
location.cities_list: Valdivia, Las Animas, La Unión, Río Bueno, Corral
location.cities_list_w_pop: Valdivia (133,419), Las Animas (30,000), La Unión (26,298), Río Bueno (15,456), Corral (3,500)
